description: List integration invoices batch exports with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can list all integration invoices batch exports. Non-admin users can list exports only when they are linked to integration exports whose integration configs belong to brokers the user is a visible member of; otherwise no records are returned.

flags.name: --organization-invoices-batch
flags.description: Filter by organization invoices batch ID. Example: --organization-invoices-batch 123.

flags.name: --organization-invoices-batch-file
flags.description: Filter by organization invoices batch file ID.

flags.name: --integration-export
flags.description: Filter by integration export ID. Example: --integration-export 456.
